Tour of the French Riviera from Monaco to Cannes, 21 April 2003

---A map of the medieval village of Eze---
---The only entrance to the village is through this narrow gateway which was easy to defend.---
---Streets are hard to navigate - steep and cobblesone---

---Some artisans and craftsman reside above shops where they sell their goods.---
---This isolated violage was perched high so it was easy to defend from pirates and raiders from the sea.---
---Hotels and restaurants are available.---

---The site was first inhabited in the 4th century---
